posts.post_content:
MIXED BAG OF CARDS FOR SALE
E-mail [url]dmcd50@hawaii.rr.com[/url] if any questions; e-mails stating you want a card take priority over pm's or posts in this thread
Check or Paypal OK
Check: if I know you cards will go out right away, otw will wait to check clears
Paypal: We split the 3% (we don't cheat Paypal)
S/H: $5 Insured First Class

Bonus cards: First and second buyers get a freebie, namely the '53 Topps Mizell or the Ice Kings Duguid

Musical interlude . .
[url]http://www.youtube.com/v/RoGLfR8HCcI[/url]


Click thumbnails for larger images. Click "Original" below scan for super-sized image.

<!-- BEGIN HTML CODE -->
<script language="javascript" src="http://hosting.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/sportscardsetc/mischidden/forsale"></script><noscript>To view this photos album, please enable Javascript in your browser. Hi- I would like the T202 Wheat Stikes out card. Thanks, Bill

Good morning, mainlanders. I awoke to approximately 15 or so emails, pms etc, and once I have fortified myself with a couple of cups of artificial life support I will sort through it all to determine who gets what. Looks like there's strong interest in the T209s, the Wheat T202 and the E97s. I'm amenable to offers on the other cards - not looking to get rich here just want to roll some dupes back into the hobby.

David,

I just have to say, that for a wide variety of reasons - you are the man.  Thank you.

Best,
Craig
Thank you for the kind words, Craig. I'll tell them you said so at my next parole hearing.:o
I would assume you use Kona blend?

David,

Aloha!

Just let me know when your next parole hearing is and I'll be happy to tell them in person.  Any excuse to come out to the islands for a bit of da kine.

Best,
Craig

OK. Everyone who emailed/pm'ed me should have received congratulations or condolences by now. The ink was barely dry on my initial post before the Contentneas and the T202 Wheat were spoken for. Must have been the dreaded East Coast Advantage again I suppose. The E97s went quick, too - just Heinchman remains available. Please feel free to make offers on the Obaks and Fatimas, too.

My Monday is booked solid but I will mail out all cards on Tuesday. Please make sure I have your mailing addresses by then.

Nah. Drink 100% Kona. Way mo' bettah.

Craig: Better get here quick. Moving to Vancouver Island next month and dey no mo' da kine over deah. More about that later.

Thanks to all who participated in this BST go-round. Been a pleasure.

PS. Hope you all enjoyed my little YouTube project.
its good to live on the East Coast...:D but I have really enjoyed the time I stayed on the West Coast.
give me your best price and I will take it , thank you , frank /845/590/6224

Bump for this'n'that

Frank: Just e-mailed you with a price and marked card as Pending until I hear from you.

Four cards remain available with reduced prices:
E93 Leach [STRIKE]$75[/STRIKE] $60
T212-2 Swain [STRIKE]$75[/STRIKE] $50 SOLD
T222 Leach [STRIKE]$75[/STRIKE] $60
T222 Murray [STRIKE]$100[/STRIKE] $75
